title: Ornate Shadow Key
summaries: The Ornate Shadow Key is a pet-summoning item that spawns a pet Shadow Mimic to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Shadow Mimic propels itself by spinning towards them while emitting a trail of purple flames. It will also occasionally spit out non-collectible cosmetic coins. The Ornate Shadow Key has a 1/10 (10%) chance of being obtained from Shadow Chests and a 1/20 (5%) chance of being obtained from Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
